name: example-before-each-visit
description: Getting code coverage when cy.visit is used in beforeEach hook

scripts.coverage:check-files: ../node_modules/.bin/check-coverage main.js && ../node_modules/.bin/check-coverage second.js && ../node_modules/.bin/check-coverage not-covered.js && ../node_modules/.bin/only-covered --from coverage/coverage-final.json main.js second.js not-covered.js
